title: whats the best adc items against mundo ?
body:
I main {{champion:51}}  and I really want to shred that madman

what items should I rush cause sooner or later he's gonna tp to bot and stay there for a while

replies.body:
Blade of the ruined king is still a good Anti-Tank item, even after the nerf.
The new Upgraded Last Whisper too, both of them are good vs mundo. You can either shread him or prevent his healing depending on which one you took.

{{item:3033}} {{item:3153}}

They may be ok now, but they are your only hope.
Lord Dominik's Regards is also a nice choice
I think it would be {{item:3036}} {{item:3033}} or {{item:3153}} rush executioner's or giant slayer. Even though botrk has been hit with some nerfs, it's still pretty ok

{{item:3153}} {{item:3139}}  {{item:3033}} {{item:3031}}{{item:3046}} {{item:3006}} 

A note: you should always get PD against Mundo and nothing else. That is because you can actually outrun him, even if you get hit by cleavers, with the 12% speed bonus. Once you finish both lifesteal items, you use him as a fountain.

Other than builds, you need to abuse the fact you can place several traps fairly quickly and generally prevent him from doing anything to you for a while... When I was trying Cait I found Mundo the easiest to deal with and I didn't even go for the grievous wounds lw, I simply abused my traps since I maxed them 2nd.

Honestly? The only thing you -can- do is get {{item:3006}} {{item:3153}} {{item:3046}} {{item:3033}} {{item:3139}} {{item:3031}} 

Obviously, you need the GW. If you do not, he'll have a Visage and will be healing at 6% per sec (Base is 5%, 20% boost is 1% more) and will have about 4-5k health. That's 240-300 healing per second. You'll cut that by 40%, bring him down to a much more reasonable amount of 144-180 per sec. Quite a big decrease, though you can't even get that until your IE, PD, and BotRK are finished.
if your really haf problems with mundo, you can easily delay pd/ie by 800g for executioners...

IE is usually your first item. If you go with anything else as a first item, you'd be crying because the next best option is a BT, which doesn't fit into the build. Could do the 800g before the PD, sure.
Well since {{item:3153}} is pretty bad now and both {{item:3035}} items are pretty bad... There is no counter to tanks lel.
lord dominik's is pretty ok. mortal reminder is definitely garbage though
